thread.title: Are you a victim of the dividend tax snatch?

author: Richard Dyson
title: Are you a victim of the dividend tax snatch?
text: A tax change so stealthy that Gordon Brown would be proud of it Are you a victim of the dividend tax snatch? Low income savers, as well as wealthy investors, are among the groups worst affected. This chart shows how much tax you'll pay A pickpocket taking something from a womans handbag
